Same way as you did in Ubuntu.
sudo apt-get install xubuntu-restricted-extras ; sudo apt-get install xubuntu-restricted-addons
Because you forgot to use sudo
If you have a package manager app open, you will have to wait untill you're finished with it and close it before attempting to install xubuntu-extras*
